title: Are Germans vulgar, and do they curse a lot? - Quora

response.answer_text: As with every social group in the world you have a bit of a bell curve in terms of their decency, with a certain number at the bottom end anyway. That being said there is no such thing as “The German” or any consistent level of cursing amongst them. Some do, most don’t, under normal circumstances. After living in Australia for over 6 years now I believe that cursing is more popular here. I hear the F- and C-word a lot more than I ever heard any German equivalents. But that’s just an example from my personal observation. Not sure if there are statistics on the average use of words like shit (Scheisse, merde,…) in different cultures. What might be true is that the German language itself sounds harsher to someone from an English speaking background. You shouldn’t come to the conclusion though that this means anything in terms of how vulgar or rude people are.
